remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来更新和呈现基于每个帧的位图。Use the class to update and render a bitmap on a per-frame basis. 这是适用于生成算法的内容，如一个分形映像，以及数据可视化效果，如音乐可视化工具。This is useful for generating algorithmic content, such as a fractal image, and for data visualization, such as a music visualizer. 类使用两个缓冲区。The class uses two buffers. *后台缓冲区*在系统内存中分配，它可以累计当前未显示的内容。The *back buffer* is allocated in system memory and accumulates content that is not currently displayed. *前台缓冲区*在系统内存中分配，它包含当前显示的内容。The *front buffer* is allocated in system memory and contains the content that is currently displayed. 呈现系统将前台缓冲区复制到视频内存中进行显示。The rendering system copies the front buffer to video memory for display. 两个线程使用这些缓冲区。Two threads use these buffers. *用户界面 (UI) 线程*生成 UI 但不将其呈现到屏幕。The *user interface (UI) thread* generates the UI but does not present it to the screen. UI 线程对用户输入、 计时器和其他事件做出响应。The UI thread responds to user input, timers, and other events. 应用程序可以拥有多个 UI 线程。An application can have multiple UI threads. *呈现线程*撰写和呈现从 UI 线程的变化。The *render thread* composes and renders changes from the UI thread. 没有每个应用程序只有一个呈现线程。There is only one render thread per application. UI 线程对后台缓冲区写入内容。The UI thread writes content to the back buffer. 呈现线程读取来自前台缓冲区的内容，并将其复制到视频内存。The render thread reads content from the front buffer and copies it to video memory. 与更改的矩形区域跟踪对后台缓冲区的更改。Changes to the back buffer are tracked with changed rectangular regions. 调用之一重载更新并自动在后台缓冲区中显示内容。Call one of the overloads to update and display content in the back buffer automatically. 更好地控制更新，以及用于多线程访问后台缓冲区，使用以下工作流。For greater control over updates, and for multi-threaded access to the back buffer, use the following workflow. 1. 调用方法来保留后台缓冲区用于更新。Call the method to reserve the back buffer for updates. 2. 通过访问获取指向后台缓冲区的属性。Obtain a pointer to the back buffer by accessing the property. 3. 更改写入后台缓冲区。Write changes to the back buffer. 其他线程可能将更改写入后台缓冲区时处于锁定状态。Other threads may write changes to the back buffer when the is locked. 4. 调用方法，以指示已更改的区域。Call the method to indicate areas that have changed. 5. 调用方法以释放后台缓冲区，并允许呈现到屏幕。Call the method to release the back buffer and allow presentation to the screen. 当更新发送到呈现线程时，呈现线程将更改的矩形从后台缓冲区复制到前台缓冲区。When updates are sent to the rendering thread, the rendering thread copies the changed rectangles from the back buffer to the front buffer. 呈现系统控制此 exchange 以避免死锁和重绘项目，比如"撕裂"。The rendering system controls this exchange to avoid deadlocks and redraw artifacts, such as "tearing". ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何可以用作的源绘制像素，当鼠标移动。The following example demonstrates how a can be used as the source of an to draw pixels when the mouse moves.
